channel.title: PYNQ-Z1 on Superuser
channel.description: Recent content in PYNQ-Z1 on Superuser

item.title: Configure PS of PYNQ to work with SDK
item.description: Hi, If you’re an FPGA fan or someone who’s got PYNQ board for fun, you might be having a hard time making it run Vivado SDK projects. That’s because, the PYNQ-Z1, the cheap Zynq-7020 board doesn’t have any popular DDR ram on board. You need to configure it by hand, however, tclÂ is at your rescue. When you create a project and include Zynq-PS system to the block diagram, most of the time you don’t need to change the DDR timing properties because of most of the popular boards ie.
